text: Narcanon is a misspelling which could refer to: * Narconon, the substance abuse program associated with the Church of Scientology, founded in 1966 Narcanon should not be confused with these unrelated organisations: * Narcotics Anonymous (NA), the twelve-step program of recovery from drug addiction, founded in 1953 * Nar-Anon, the twelve-step program for friends and family members of drug addicts, established in 1968
title: Narcanon
